May the 4th Be With You... Today, like every year since, I celebrate our general, the amazing #CarrieFisher. I made this portrait after her passing I cant say enough how important this woman was/is. Much love! #StarWarsDay #StarWars #MayThe4thBeWithYou https://t.co/WjeLdYnWAe

What the heck kinda bug crawled up this reviewers butt? This is just a poorly assessed and mean spirited review. Shame on them. I agree with you @ThommyHutson https://t.co/y1PNSR1RFZ

@summerartistart @CaptainCKCoffee Hi @summerartistart - we at #WomenMakeTrek are super sickened by the blatant theft of your art. Wed love to have you as part of our initiative if youre interested. Feel free to reach out to us! @BatlethBabe I love your work. https://t.co/LPBfQalyF7
Wow... Seriously? Care to explain @cosmicAnik22 ? Unless theres an epically good answer, you should be ashamed of yourself. https://t.co/qNHOSVb2lc
@cosplayandnails @wcruz73 @TheDeniseCrosby @StarTrek @StarTrekOnPPlus If that happens, pictures please! Faboosh!

Perfection right here. Having had some dark moments in my life, this resonates so truly. Many (including those closest to you) say they dont define others by their lower moments, but Ive experienced that a lot do. Its been eye-opening sad to see, but one perseveres. https://t.co/cy7SXdu72P
@nikodals Thanks so much!!

Happy belated birthday to the incredible #MichellePfeiffer! Her talents have graced us for years we couldnt be more grateful. I dont know about you Miss Kitty, but Im feeling so much...Yummier. https://t.co/8cDPqcg2WS
@wcruz73 Jeez, thats beautiful. Ive been to #PuertoRico twice and not experienced nearly enough of what it has to offer.
@wonderkrisp Fingers crossed! Good luck!
@TK9582 What the very F is wrong w/ this country and its priorities?
@Larkistin89 @floobish Sold. Ill bump it up on my list. Ive been on a Murder Show kick recently haha. https://t.co/SqWavTm1wN
@floobish @Larkistin89 Forgive my stupid question, but this is the latest from Ronald D Moore, right?
@neilfraser78 @cmloweART I adore this so so much!
@Larkistin89 Oh! I want to watch this! Is it as good as I would hope?
- The villains... Ah, forget it. - Raidens eyes... - My brother really enjoyed it but he also had very little exposure to the game franchise outside of casually playing the new installment. (5/5)

- In a day in age where we are more aware of the role and importance of women in society, the handling of Sonya (1 of 2 featured female characters in the film) was super tone-deaf. I could go on for days about how annoyed this made me. - Kano worked for me here. (4/5)

- I know this is an action film based on a video game, but I could not get into or root for any of the characters I was supposed to. Or in general really. - The films action sequences were super dull for me. Its the one thing I expected to really be done right. (3/5)
- I didnt enjoy the film much outside of the opening. It felt cinematic like a completely different film. This was also probably my favorite action sequence in the entire run-time. (2/5)

So I watched #MortalKombat (2021) with my brother last week here are my thoughts. If you loved the film, rock on! Im not here to dissuade or be controversial, these are just my personal thoughts: (1/5)
@squallina Stay tuned! I have a couple male characters coming up really soon.

Welcome to my latest #StarTrek art project where I envision our fave Trek characters attending the intergalactic #StarTrekGala! Heres Beverly Crusher (aka @gates_mcfadden). Her look is 50s Nurse meets Dixon Hill meets Glam Couture. Stay tuned for more attendees very soon! https://t.co/9B2JTB9pVc
Hey #StarTrek fam, whos ready for the first arrival for my new art project, the #StarTrekGala? One of our faves has arrived early to the intergalactic fashion extravaganza!
